Dialogue.Page: Oh, heyo, hatchling. Thought you were flying off in your big wooden tin of marshmallows and tape today.
Did ya suddenly have a change of heart about helping me take down this dumb Nomai door I told you about the other day?

DialogueOption.Text: What's with you and this door?
Oh, I've seen these kinds of doors before on Ember Twin. It's easy, you just look at the orb and guide it to the other side.

Dialogue.Page: Am I seriously the only one in the village who's bugged we've never been able to open this blasted door?
Back in my younger days, I explored everywhere there was to see on Timber Hearth - climbed every tree, spelunked every cave.
Even once strapped on an oxygen tank and swam in those underground caves. Found a funny mural right below here, though I still dunno what it's showing.
Anyways, this big mysterious door was the one thing on our planet we were just.. never able to open and explore.
What could be in there? What did the Nomai want to keep anyone out from? Or.. <Pause/> was there something they wanted to keep in?

It just eats at me every now and then. But most of the villagers seem to think there's good reason it's sealed up, or get fussy about breaking into a Nomai place. Saying the Nomai are gonna haunt and curse anyone that goes in.
Whole buncha mud if you ask me. I've stuck in my leg into a patch of ghost matter to make a point before; I'm not afraid of some spooky curse the village made up.
You got any ideas on how to open this darn thing up?

DialogueOption.Text: Um, have you tried just looking at the orb and guiding it to the other side?

Dialogue.Page: Hah! Why don't you go ahead and give that a try?
You think I would be dumb enough to stare at this door since I was a hatchling, if that just worked so easily?
The orb follows where I look at, alright, but it won't go farther than a certain point.
The only way through's with a pickaxe, I reckon.

DialogueOption.Text: Not right now. But I'll keep two eyes out for anything that might help.
Why do you wanna get in so bad?

Dialogue.Page: Gah. All that talk and you're no help. Hey, if you see Riebeck out there, could you ask 'em for any updates on this door?
They were about the only other person curious about what was in there, and said they'd keep three eyes out while studying Nomai architecture off-planet.
Back again? You should go tell the villagers there's a bramble seed over at Youngbark Crater if you're sticking around. I left a note and got sidetracked.

DialogueOption.Text: Tell me about the door again.
Have you tried looking at the orb and guiding it to the other side?
Just passing by. Talk to you later!

Dialogue.Page: Mm. Take care out there, hatchling. Keep an eye out for Riebeck for me, and the other three for any clues about this door.
